# prelm

Pretrained Language Models


## Description

```
from prelm.bert import BertConfig, BertModule


```


## Installation

From PyPI distribution system:

```
pip install prelm
```


Or from the code:

```
git clone https://github.com/Li-Ming-Fan/prelm
cd Zeras
make clean install
```


Or just incorporate the directory prelm/ to your project.
